channel.title: Xbox 360 question
channel.description:
I was wondering if its possible to play your xbox 360 on your pc?
If it is please give me a link on how to do it.

item.title: Xbox 360 question
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

My graphics card (ATI Radeon X850XT) has some of those plugs with it that you can basically hook RCA cords to (the red, yellow, and whites).

That either allows you to view the TV through the computer, or the computer through the TV.

I’d imagine you could use something like that?

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 question
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Greeny is right, you can’t play the game on the computers, first of all controls are different, there aren’t any controls actually. You CAN see the game on the computer, but you would have to use your X-Box controller to actually play it. (Tv-Tuner).

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 question
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I can’t believe I’m wasting my time with this; from my original post in this thread.

Greeny:

You can play on a DVI monitor, but you can’t actually run games on the base unit. If by computer you mean monitor then yes you can, but your concept of computer is all wrong.

That post answered everything we just argued about, now I helped you out by answering the question, are you going to continue to carry on about something so insignificant after your question has been answered?

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 question
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Greeny:

I doubt it because, if you could run xbox360 games off a desktop then it would remove the need for a XB360 and MS would lose lots of profits and sales.

[quote=“mrrules, post:9, topic:159848”]Wow are you stupid…

I’m not talking about putting the xbox games into the computer and running it a computer game…

I’m talking about seeing the xbox game on the laptop with the game in the xbox 360.

Seem you don’t know anything about xbox modding. And yes no dout its coming out.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 question
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

No your missing the point, go back to my original post, and that’s what I told you. Not the other way round, it’s you whom has issues reading.

Read full topic

Lol dude thats what i just pointed out to you…

I swear you people can’t read these days.

item.title: Xbox 360 question
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Then it’s not playing it off the computer, it’s playing it off the monitor, you are well and truly retarded if you don’t know the difference.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 question
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

I already said i found something if you even read what I said.

mrrules:

I know how to run of DVI screen already , and i found a video about the computer thing and theres something thats going to be released to do that soon.
